DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To report immediate prolong ( one week ) effect elastic bandage balance control subject chronic ankle instability . Material method : Twenty-eight individual successfully complete study protocol , 14 randomly assign elastic bandage group ( 7 men , 7 woman ) 14 assign non-standardized tape group ( 9 men , 5 woman ) . To objectively measure postural sway use computerized dynamic posturography Sensory Organization Test Unilateral Stance test . We analyze follow Sensory Organization Test parameter : composite Sensory Organization Test score , composite Sensory Organization Test strategy Sensory Organization Test condition 2 strategy . In addition , study centre gravity sway velocity open eye close eye US test .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Elastic Bandage Balance Chronic Ankle Instability
DOC.criteria: Subjects Chronic Ankle Instability Neurologic disease Vestibular disease
